titles.title: Stand In Awe (moving past the brazen altar)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bb
Moving past the Brazen Altar
Passing through the Holy Place
Enter in before His Presence
See the glory of His Face

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Precious servants of the Temple
Cease your busyness and toil
Now fulfill your deepest ministry
Come and satisfy your Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Stand in awe
(stand in awe)
Worship Him
(worship Him)
Open up your hearts exclusively to Him
